mapper.select: select ann.total_title, evta.eval_status, subann.sub_title, ann.closed_at, evta.final_selected_at, evcom.prog_status, subann.sub_ann_no from announcement ann inner join sub_announcement subann on ann.ann_no = subann.ann_no inner join eval_committee evcom on subann.sub_ann_no = evcom.sub_ann_no inner join evaluation_member evmem on evmem.eval_committee_no = evcom.eval_committee_no inner join eval_task evta on evta.eval_committee_no = evcom.eval_committee_no

SELECT DISTINCT sann.sub_ann_no AS subannno, et.eval_status AS evalstatus, sann.sub_title AS subtitle, et.final_selected_at - INTERVAL '3' DAY AS startdate, et.final_selected_at AS finalselectedat, rp.rnd_task_no AS rndtaskno, rp.task_name AS taskname, rp.rnd_institution AS rndinstitution, (SELECT name FROM member WHERE mem_no = rp.mem_no) AS roundname, et.total_score AS totalscore, rp.plan_status AS planstatus, ec.name AS committeename, et.sel_completed_at AS selcompletedat FROM announcement ann INNER JOIN sub_announcement sann ON ann.ann_no = sann.ann_no INNER JOIN rnd_plan rp ON rp.sub_ann_no = sann.sub_ann_no INNER JOIN member mem ON mem.mem_no = rp.mem_no INNER JOIN eval_task et ON et.rnd_plan_no = rp.rnd_plan_no INNER JOIN evaluation_member em on em.eval_committee_no = et.eval_committee_no INNER JOIN eval_committee ec ON ec.sub_ann_no = sann.sub_ann_no WHERE sann.sub_ann_no = #{subAnnNo}

SELECT mem.name AS coname, ins.name AS insname, rp.rnd_task_no AS corsname, es.score as score FROM evaluation_member evmem INNER JOIN member mem ON mem.mem_no = evmem.mem_no INNER JOIN institution ins ON ins.institution_no = mem.institution_no INNER JOIN eval_task et ON et.eval_committee_no = evmem.eval_committee_no INNER JOIN eval_score es ON es.eval_committee_no = et.eval_committee_no AND es.mem_no = evmem.mem_no INNER JOIN rnd_plan rp ON rp.rnd_plan_no = et.rnd_plan_no WHERE rp.rnd_task_no = #{rndTaskNo}
